<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Adds event handler (EH) attached to the current mission and returns EH handle. If EH has some data to return upon event, it is passed in <tt>_this</tt> variable. For the list of available mission event handlers see: [[Arma 3: Event Handlers/addMissionEventHandler]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Since Arma 3 v1.63.137807 the EH handle is also stored in <tt>_thisEventHandler</tt> variable and is available during EH code execution.<br>
Since Arma 3 v2.03.147276 it is possible to pass additional arguments to the EH code via optional param. The arguments are stored in <tt>_thisArgs</tt> variable</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''addMissionEventHandler''' [event, expression, args]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [event, expression, args]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> event: [[String]] - event name

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> expression: [[Code]] or [[String]] - expression that will be executed in [[missionNamespace]] when EH fires.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> args (Optional): [[Array]] - additional arguments to be passed to the EH code. Available during code execution via <tt>_thisArgs</tt> variable. <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03.147276</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>yes</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - The index of the currently added mission event handler is returned.

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_id = [[addMissionEventHandler]] ["PlayerDisconnected", { [[systemChat]] [[str]] [[Magic Variables#this|_this]] }];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_id = [[addMissionEventHandler]] ["EachFrame", { [[systemChat]] [[str]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[_thisArgs]], [[time]]] }, <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[time]]]]; <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03.147276</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>yes</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeMissionEventHandler]], [[removeAllMissionEventHandlers]]
